TopicTitle: And now, the greatest of its kind in the history pf the world... Welcome to......

Articles.Content:
ANTICLIMAX!

'Sup. Names AlthalusFromSpace, or Althalus or whatever really. My real name is very old and celtic and tends to tie peoples' tongues in knots, so I'll leave it out of here.

I've been playing KSP since a few days after the 0.17 release, but now I find myself with enough free time to get into this community. The mount and blade community are lovely and all, but they're not great for an intelligent chat.

I'm a 16 year old Irish student. I like Sci-Fi, things that explode, and sifting through dubious amounts of codes to make mods. I also like Youtube videos, and I'm looking at setting up a collaboration channel, the thread for which is underway. I'm also an Actor, so that's where the dramatic entrance came in. Abstract drama is the best drama.

So yeah. Hi 0.o
Dia duit, Althalus! Go n-ÃƒÂ©irÃƒÂ­ do thuras leat le Kerbals!

Welcome to the forums!

We'll be looking forward to seeing the fruits of your endeavors. Best of luck on the Youtube channel as well.

I'd also like to extend an invitation to check out the Drawing Board (link in my sig), even though you're already a fairly experienced player. Even though it's mainly geared towards beginners, there are also a number of other tools and resources there that any player can find useful.

Happy landings!

Dia duit, Althalus! Go n-ÃƒÂ©irÃƒÂ­ do thuras leat le Kerbals!

Go raibh mÃƒÂ­le, a chara. NÃƒÂ­ raibh mÃƒÂ© ag tnÃƒÂºth leis an nGaeilge anseo.

To everyone else, thanks for the kind words!
Haha. You got it, mate. I don't get a lot of chances to try Gaelic living in the deserts of New Mexico. Besides, I'm better at launching kerbals into orbit than I am with the Irish language.
I hope you have a great time here!
